N-Back Task.Description: The verbal N-Back Task measures working memory ability

experiment_name.Description: Name of the experiment used to generate the data file

data_file_basename.Description: Name of data output from E-prime

experiment_version.Description: Version of the task used to generate the data file

group.Description: Group number. As part of this experiment, no Group is assigned at runtime, so defaults to 1

random_seed.Description: Auto-generated random seed used for randomization

runtime_version.Description: E-run version used to run experiment

runtime_version_expected.Description: E-run version expected to run experiment

session_date.Description: Date of experiment; based on the computer

session_start_date_time_utc.Description: Date and time of experiment in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)

session_time.Description: Time of task based on the computer

list1.Description: ID of list1 procedure being run. Will be equal to list1_sample because list1 procedure orders were not randomized

Levels.1: ID 1, corresponds to b1BlockProc (block 1 of nback task)
Levels.2: ID 2, corresponds to Break (break screen option)
Levels.3: ID 3, corresponds to GetReadyProc (get ready screen)
Levels.5: ID 5, corresponds to b1Block2Proc (block 2 of nback task)

list1_cycle.Description: Cycle number of list1 (which contains b1BlockProc, Break, GetReadyProc, FocusProc, b1Block2Proc). Task was programmed to have 1 cycle

Levels.List1: A list that contains 5 procedure blocks (b1BlockProc, Break, GetReadyProc, FocusProc, b1Block2Proc)

trial.Description: Stimulus number being presented from the corresponding procedure_block (range: 1-30)

b1_list1.Description: ID of stimulus (letter) being presented from b1_list1. Will be equal to b1_list1_sample since stimulus order was not randomized

b1_list1_cycle.Description: Cycle number for the first block of the task. Task was programmed for 1 cycle

b1_list1_sample.Description: Order stimulus (letter) was presented within Block 1 (range: 1-30). For example, 1 = first letter presented, 5 = fifth letter presented.

b1_list2.Description: ID of stimulus (letter) being presented from b1_list2. Will be equal to b1_list2_sample since trial order was not randomized

b1_list2_cycle.Description: Cycle number for the second block of the task. Task was programmed for 1 cycle

b1_list2_sample.Description: Order stimulus (letter) was presented within Block 2 (range: 1-30). For example, 1 = first letter presented, 5 = fifth letter presented.

b1_stim.Description: Stimulus letter presented for each trial

b1_stim_acc.Description: Accuracy of participant response for target (!) trials. Does not reflect overall accuracy!

Levels.0: indicates no response was made for a target letter (an incorrect response) OR no response was made for a fill letter (correct response)
Levels.1: correct response (indicates {SPACE} hit for target letter)

b1_stim_cresp.Description: Correct response for the each trial

b1_stim_duration_error.Description: Difference in stimuli duration and the intended duration - when the event is terminated by a response, a value of - 99999 is used (i.e., since the duration error cannot be computed in that situation)

b1_stim_onset_delay.Description: Time from stimuli onset time and the expected/target onset time

b1_stim_onset_time.Description: Time from start of task to stimuli presentation

b1_stim_onset_to_onset_time.Description: Time from the current trial and the next trial's stimulis OnsetTime

b1_stim_resp.Description: Response to stimuli for each trial

b1_stim_rt.Description: Response time to stimuli for each trial

b1_stim_rt_time.Description: Time from start of task to response for each trial

condition.Description: Condition type of the presented stimulus

Levels.Fill: The presented stimulus does not meet the criteria for 1-Back response
Levels.Target: The presented stimulus meets the criteria for a 1-Back response
Levels: The presented stimulus is not a letter

correct.Description: Correct response for the each trial

running_trial.Description: Name of list of corresponding to procedure trail

Levels.b1List1: List containing stimuli for first block
Levels.b1List2: List containing stimuli for second block
